articles.description:
Re @Jamiescript explains what onchain NFTs bring to the table!

Jamiebones:â€‚#30daysoftext
Day 10: Write about on-chain NFTs
on-chain NFTs have everything stored directly on the blockchain. This includes the NFT's metadata, such as name, description, attributes, and even the media file itself. This direct storage offers several key advantages:
articles.title: Re @Jamiescript explains what onchain NFTs bring to the table!

Ini Abasi Ekanem:â€‚ğŸ”·ğŸ”¹Onchain Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs)ğŸ”¹ğŸ”·
Onchain NFTs are a decentralized and secure way to represent ownership of assets.
They are unique cryptographic tokens that are stored directly on a blockchain, ensuring transparency, immutability, and irrefutable proof of ownership.
